subject: Football
lead_paragraph: PITTSBURGH, Dec. 25 (AP) — Ben Roethlisberger knew he would not be holding up a Super Bowl trophy every season, and that winning 27 of his first 31 starts set a pace that would be impossible for any N.F.L. quarterback to match.
snippet: PITTSBURGH, Dec. 25 (AP) — Ben Roethlisberger knew he would not be holding up a Super Bowl trophy every season, and that winning 27 of his first 31 starts set a pace that would be impossible for any N.F.L. quarterback to match.
